Sentencas: This paper contributes a novel sustainability index and modified exergy indicators for conventional gas turbines and solid oxide fuel cell integrated gas turbine (SOFC-GT) hybrid power cycles.
Titulo: Estimation of exergy-based sustainability index and performance evaluation of a novel intercooled hybrid gas turbine system

Sentencas: In this work, an intercooled gas turbine (Ic-GT) cycle is considered as a base cycle, which gives an additive advantage in lowering the power required for the compressor.
Titulo: Estimation of exergy-based sustainability index and performance evaluation of a novel intercooled hybrid gas turbine system

Sentencas: Moreover, on SOFC integration with Ic-GT, the qualitative and quantitative performance are examined.
Titulo: Estimation of exergy-based sustainability index and performance evaluation of a novel intercooled hybrid gas turbine system

Sentencas: Numerical modeling is done using MATLAB and an exclusive comparison has been made based on energy-exergy and sustainability analysis for the system and its components.
Titulo: Estimation of exergy-based sustainability index and performance evaluation of a novel intercooled hybrid gas turbine system

Sentencas: On comparing the first law efficiency at turbine inlet tem-perature, TIT 1250K and rp = 18 for Ic-GT, intercooled recuperated gas turbine (Ic-RGT), and Ic-SOFC-RGT, it is 25.82%, 36.04%, and 64.78%, respectively.
Titulo: Estimation of exergy-based sustainability index and performance evaluation of a novel intercooled hybrid gas turbine system

Sentencas: Similarly, second law effi-ciency is 11.43%, 22.33%, and 61.11% and the overall sustainability index is 1.12, 1.28, and 2.57 for Ic-GT, Ic-RGT, and Ic-SOFC-RGT, respectively.
Titulo: Estimation of exergy-based sustainability index and performance evaluation of a novel intercooled hybrid gas turbine system

Sentencas: Nine other modified exergy-based parameters are used to identify the role of fuel and product exergy and then compare the most affected component in three configurations.
Titulo: Estimation of exergy-based sustainability index and performance evaluation of a novel intercooled hybrid gas turbine system
